tx_power_dbm.title: Tx Power in dBm
tx_power_dbm.description: Set transmission power of each antenna in dBm (WARNING: please refer to the ORS Handbook to check the maximum values for your ORS, it should not be set too high or you will get bad radio quality)

tx_gain.title: Expert: Tx gain
tx_gain.description: Expert only. Tx gain (in dB), between 0 and 89, can be used instead of Tx dBm Power to directly control tx_gain Amarisoft option (WARNING: please refer to the ORS Handbook to check the maximum values for your ORS, it should not be set too high or you will get bad radio quality) (Do not set both Tx Gain and Tx dBm Power)

tx_power_offset.title: Expert: TX Power Offset
tx_power_offset.description: Expert only. Offset between Amarisoft SDR50 board power and ORS power. For fine tuning the reference signal power value. Default depends on ORS frequency, please refer to the connection parameters

rx_gain.description: Rx gain (in dB), it should usually always be between 25 and 45. Please refer to the ORS Handbook to see how to fine tune this value

cell_id.description: Cell ID. Equal to ORS Serial number modulo 256 by default
